name: Quipper Limited
description: Developer of an online education platform intended to assist students to learn anytime, anywhere, at their own pace. The company's online education platform provides an e-learning resource in a quiz format which allows users to create their own quizzes via a content-distribution process and engages various users worldwide, enabling users to learn in a fun way.
one_liner: Developer of an online education platform intended to assist students to learn anytime, anywhere, at their own pace. The company's online education platform provides an e-learning resource in a quiz format which allows users to create their own quizzes via a content-distribution process and engages various users worldwide, enabling users to learn in a fun way.
